        Creates a java.io.ByteArrayInputStream from a file.

        Returns:
        a java.io.ByteArrayInputStream containing the contents of the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while creating a ByteArrayInputStream

      • byteStreamFromInputStream

                                                              throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a java.io.ByteArrayInputStream from a java.io.InputStream.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the InputStream to be converted
        Returns:
        a ByteArrayInputStream containing the contents of the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while creating a ByteArrayInputStream

      • writeByteStreamToFile

        public static void writeByteStreamToFile(java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream csvStream,
                                         java.lang.String outputFileName,
                                         java.lang.Boolean writeUTF8ByteOrderMark)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a file and write the contents of a java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream to the file.
        Parameters:
        csvStream - the ByteArrayOutputStream to be written to the file.
        outputFileName - the name of the file to be created.
        writeUTF8ByteOrderMark - true if the UTF-8 byte order mark should be written to the file; false if not
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs while creating a file or writing the stream to the file
